thread.section_title: Ascendtech, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ascendtech, Inc. | www.ascendtech.us
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text: I purchased a tablet from this vendor. The description matched the product & worked as described. I had a problem on how to adjust the screen intensity & asked them for help. They made their suggestions which I followed. I noted to them that there was an application that controlled my screen that did resolve my issue. They responded to my issue in just a few hours. thanks
